entry.title: bip-0021 and bip-0072 ambiguities & mistakes
entry.summary: In a message exchange on March 6, 2014, Mike Hearn requested a pull request from William regarding QR code escaping. William then submitted the pull request and noted that the behavior of the bitcoin-qt client should now align better with the recommended practices outlined in the RFC. The de-escaped QR codes resulting from this adjustment are also reportedly much more aesthetically pleasing.
